snippet.title: Jeremy McGrath's Offroad - Trailer
snippet.description:
Put the pedal to the metal in this gameplay trailer for the upcoming downloadable racing game Jeremy McGrath's Offroad, coming to XBLA and PSN this spring.

Platforms: Xbox 360, PS3
E for Everyone: No Descriptors
Genre: Racing 
Publisher: Reverb Publishing
Developer: 2XL Games

Race to IGN for more:
http://xbox360.ign.com/objects/108/108287.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, guides, trailers and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
